m_szDocTitle: Patent US6194099 - Electrochemical cells with carbon nanofibers and electroactive sulfur compounds - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Electrochemical cells with carbon nanofibers and electroactive sulfur compounds US 6194099 B1 Abstract The present invention pertains to solid composite cathodes which comprise (a) an electroactive sulfur-containing cathode material which, in its oxidized state, comprises a polysulfide moiety of the formula, -Sm-, wherein m is an integer from 3 to 10; and (b) non-activated carbon nanofibers. The present invention also pertains to electric current producing cells comprising such solid composite cathodes, and methods of making such solid composite cathodes and electric current producing cells. I
